features: Bottoms Fabric : Supra WindDry: 4-way stretch 3-ply softshell with breathable, windproof and warmth propreties - HeatMaxx: 4-way stretch opaque construction knit with brushed back - Square Mesh: Ventilation, stretchability and quick drying
Bottoms Fabric Technology: Heat retention, Moisture management, Water, stain and abrasion resistant
Garment Feature Bottoms : All-weather protection at front and upper back - Articulated knees - Ankle grippers
Bottoms Seams: Anti-irritation seams to prevent chafing and the resulting redness
Bottoms Visibility Features: Reflective logos at front and back, Reflective trim
Bottoms Zipper: 5"/13 cm offset ankle zips
